title: WHY CAN\'T I REACH A REAL PERSON LOCATED IN WILMINGTON, NC WHEN I\'M TRYING TO DO BUSINESS WITH THE STAR NEWS? EVERY NUMBER I CALL TRANSFERS ME OUT OF THE COUNTRY! I REFUSE TO GIVE MY FINIANCIAL INFORMATION TO SOMEONE OUTSIDE THE US.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4231
